task.title: Multiplicity constraint
task.shortdesc: Constrain the multiplicity of a template attribute to be more restrictive than the same attribute in its parent class.

prereq.p: You can only constrain an attribute with a multiplicity that is more restrictive than its parent CDA class or template. For example, you can constraint 0..1 to be 1..1, but you cannot change 1..1 to be 0..1.

step.cmd: Select the table row for the attribute you want to constrain.
Select the Multiplicity table cell in that row using the mouse or by navigating with the keyboard arrow keys.
Either double-click in that cell or press Enter to show a list of multiplicity options, or type into the cell for other specialized constraints, e.g. 1..2
